title: Tasks Phase: usb-device-communication - Ready for Review
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Follow a git workflow. Each task should have an explicit git commit with a helpful message. First task should be to create a feature branch and submit the spec files. Last task should be to create a PR and verify CI passes without issues and fixes any issues.

comments.comment: Follow a git workflow. Each task should have an explicit git commit with a helpful message. First task should be to create a feature branch and submit the spec files. Last task should be to create a PR and verify CI passes without issues and fixes any issues.
